summary.para: The CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO structure contains information a message recipient's content encryption key management type.
summary.div: Note Only key transport recipients are supported in PKCS #7 version 1.5.

summary.para: Indicates the union member to be used. The following values are defined.

listheader.description: Use with key transport key management
Used with key agreement key management
Use with previously distributed key encryption key management

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pKeyTrans
member.summary: A pointer to a structure. Used with CMSG_KEY_TRANS_RECIPIENT

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pKeyAgree
member.summary: A pointer to a structure. Used with CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT

member.name: CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCODE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pMailList
member.summary: A pointer to a structure. Used with CMSG_MAIL_LIST_RECIPIENT
